baseClasses

Class Word

  • java.lang.Object
    • baseClasses.Word

  • public class Word
extends java.lang.Object
    the Word class is one of the two basic classes of the whole project: it is the smallest part of the project, and provides useful tools to manage the words contained in a song.
    Author:
    Andrea Righi
